players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is dead. As the only kill, it's clear the mafia is among us. We need to analyze everyone's behavior carefully."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated Alice last night and found this to be true."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems odd for a first night choice."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you claim to investigate Alice? Diana was already dead when you would have chosen your investigation target."
Bob: "Charlie, you are mistaken. Diana was not dead when I made my investigation. The night phase occurs before the day phase. I investigated Alice and she is the mafioso."

You: "Bob is lying. Detectives investigate during the night phase, before any kills happen. Diana was alive when he would have chosen his target, making his claim to investigate me instead highly suspicious. Charlie is right to question this."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
